item.title: OpenCV
item.description: Possible Errors fatal error: dynlink_nvcuvid.h: No such file or directory In file included from /home/yubao/Software/opencv/build/modules/cudacodec/opencv_cudacodec_pch_dephelp.cxx:1: /home/yubao/Software/opencv/modules/cudacodec/src/precomp.hpp:60:18: fatal error: dynlink_nvcuvid.h: No such file or directory 60 | #include <dynlink_nvcuvid.h> | ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ compilation terminated. cat modules/cudacodec/src/precomp.hpp #if CUDA_VERSION >= 9000 #include <dynlink_nvcuvid.h>#else #include <nvcuvid.h>#endif cuda10 does not provide dynlink_nvcuvid.h any more OpenCV CUDA 10 安装 dynlink_nvcuvid.h 问题解决方法 error: ‘CODEC_F
